nodes.text: Skazz was a male assassin that lived during the Galactic Civil War.

In 1.5 ABY he was hired by Black Sun to murder the head of Corellian Security Force on Corellia. When a spacer captured the Black Sun accountant Tessa Wylden for Garm Bel Iblis' second in command, Irenez learned about Skazz's mission. The spacer agreed to help Irenez and succeeded in intercepting and killing Skazz.

Skazz was a Non-Player Character (NPC) in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. He was part of a mission given out by Irenez in Coronet that required the player to travel to a place outside the city and kill Skazz. In 2005 the NPCs Garm Bel Iblis and Irenez were removed from the game and the quest involving Skazz was therefore no longer available.

Due to the way such quests were designed by the developers, the appearance, gender and species of the NPC are different each time a player runs the mission. Therefore there's no canonical description of the character's look and species, while his sex is mentioned by Irenez and therefore canon.
